description.value:
>@Compendium[sfrpg.classes.MMyeA7kL5Vhcio05]{Nanocyte}

The following represent specialty paths that nanocytes commonly take while developing their nanite abilities. Each faculty lists the techniques you learn as you gain levels. For effects that require a saving throw, the DC is 10 + half your nanocyte level + your Constitution modifier.

Faculties

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.N5460NEe031AoP29]{Absorption}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.gnOlM0tNdmB7tj4B]{Discorporation}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.zg80xpKDcFM3p13P]{Infestation}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.fdBGqxDLdBa3mMza]{Obliteration}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.4r46S2T0VEim6OIJ]{Redirection}

@Compendium[sfrpg.class-features.tLjIUYAquhySuyZQ]{Regeneration}
